website_summaries.verdict: The overall build quality is outstanding, but several competitors offer more modern - and speedier - software.
pros: Stands out for its intuitive, user-friendly design and a crystal-clear full HD resolution
cons: Complaints of slow software and lagging sound quality are not uncommon

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the money
customer_reviews.text: The LG TV is fantastic if you want a more massive flatscreen without spending over $3K.. The picture is crisp and clear, and we don't even have a Hi-Def cable box. Service provider brought out a basic cable box. We live in an area that does not have high-speed broadband or cable TV. Once we move back to the future, this TV will only get better. Hope this review helps those of you who are trying to decide. Sidenote: The remote is a little weird, and I am still figuring out all its features and functions.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzbea

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to watch
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality and option motion smoothing is sub par - makes for a very jarring picture. In addition the sound is really awful for a tv of this size with lots of inconsistencies. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: jojowilson

customer_reviews.title: Ok but shipping was bad on my unit.
customer_reviews.text: The product was ok but the HDR wasn't as expected it kept flicking and not good to watch.I don't know if that is normal or if is defective.I also noticed some unusual cloudiness doing some scenes doing a movie I was watching, I thought I had glaucoma.My panel wasn't that great,the center of the screen appeared darker than the rest of the screen, could have been damaged in delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: top heavy
customer_reviews.text: Came with no damage, ten seconds before I was going to turn it on, I pushed it accidentally, and it fell over , damaging the screen in two places, and upon turning it on, the screen was blank, so it was dead.
customer_reviews.author: ACTIVE

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good
customer_reviews.text: Only had the TV a few days but we are pleased. Upgraded from a 50 inch to the 65 because of the size of the room and the desire to read the details on the screen a bit better. That has improved. It took a while to get through the setup process and am still learning the fine points of the remote. Not an inexpensive TV but hopefully worth the price in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Uneven blacks, AirPlay doesn't work well for video
customer_reviews.text: The blacks on this TV are very uneven--the corners of the screen are much brighter than the middle. The bottom edge has bright and dark spots, which I found distracting. It's especially noticeable at night in a dark room. Apple AirPlay is good for photos and music but very laggy and jumpy for video, which was quite disappointing. Also, there is no headphone jack, so you can only use speakers that have an optical input. But the LG Magic remote control is nice and the TV is pretty good aside from those issues.
customer_reviews.author: ESH

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Privacy Policy Agreement
customer_reviews.text: I like the picture quality, sound but it does not make any sense to me to be forced to accept privacy policy to take my personal and viewing information before I can enjoy a TV I paid for. This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Byers

customer_reviews.title: I see why it's highly rated
customer_reviews.text: After countless research I decided to forego the QLED/OLED TVs for this as it was highly rated. The picture quality is superb and by far the best TV I've purchased. I went with the 65'' and delivery was simple. I set-up a time for drop during checkout and they were punctual. Even called to let me know they were close. They only drop it off inside so don't expect them to unpack it for you. Light weight TV and my only complaint is the remote has a mouse feature than can be convenient but would like the option to turn it off if need be. Unless you're going with a QLED/OLED TV, purchase this TV with no worries.
customer_reviews.author: allen babauta

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: have a Samsung 65 inch tv, and decided to try the lg 65 nano model, great decision. Much deeper blacks, and nice vivid color. Blue still images are interlaced looking when driven by a pc, but you don't notice that if using the tv as a tv. The magic remote makes navigation of the options and features as easy as point and click. Very quick learning curve, and it permits quick access to the netflix, youtube, apple tv apps, as well as the lg setup and config optons
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV for the price, 700.00 new, not refurbished. Definitely can see the difference with the Nano series, over my other 3 year old LG TV. Easy set-up. Speakers are not any better than my other LG. That's why I use Rockville powered speakers. These paired with the TV are a great addition, especially for the price. In all, we're happy with this TV. Great value for Amazon's price of 700.00. Highy recommend LG products.
customer_reviews.author: marichal

customer_reviews.title: Big Brother nightmare!!! Must be clothed and silent to watch TV
customer_reviews.text: Avoid!!! Cannot use any of the features unless you agree to let LG document all your viewing and data queries. In addition it appears they also any the right to monitor your visually abc monitor your conversations to provide targeting advertising. It’s crazy, very much regret buying this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: A broadcast blink???
customer_reviews.text: It was the weirdest thing. The first set I ordered had a momentary "blink" in the broadcast's picture. Yes a blink. The picture would go black for a microsecond and then reappear. It happened every 3 to 10 minutes. it was annoying because this was a new set. I wanted a replacement even with the trouble of having to repack my first TV set into the box that the second TV set came in. Nevertheless I did so. Unbelievably the blinking, which I assumed was an anomaly, was present in the second TV as well. Unbelievable. I sent back the second television and ordered a Samsung Qled. That's what I have now and it is absolutely magnificent.
customer_reviews.author: C. O. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: A great product - but we were unable to sync with our iPad.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a great remote control and excellent picture quality. Although it says that you can use it with your Apple airplay, we found that we were unable to actually sync it with our iPad. Other than that it’s a great product! It also has limited audio connectors and we have to go to an optical circuit to sync with our surround sound system. You buy this you’ll need an optical cable if you have a sophisticated sound system. Took quite a few hours to update the software because our Internet is a bit slow so be warned that if you don’t have a fast Internet it could take three or four hours to upload the most current software.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Stuart Jr

customer_reviews.title: Bad picture... I hope this is just a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Uhm... This TV has horrible backlight bleed. I've attached photos to this review... At first it was just in the lower right corner and has grown to make it impossible to watch any TV that is not super bright shows... Anything dark is terrible. I contacted LG as I suspect this may be a lemon tv. They have issued a repair. If repair is unsuccessful, I am sending back to Amazon. The only reason I am attempting to get a repair before a return is because I have heard positive reviews and heard this is one of the better TVs for gaming. I also don't want to deal with TV shopping again for at least another 4-5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jablack1

customer_reviews.title: On 4K movies or streaming 4K picture is good, but on regular channels picture is not good at all.
customer_reviews.text: Picture was grainy/snowy. My 8 year old LG has better picture than this one.stand is very flimsy. Returned tv.
customer_reviews.author: Jack L. Sledge

customer_reviews.title: Good, but somewhat trying.
customer_reviews.text: I'm more than satisfied with the picture, the stability of the unit, and the packaging. All of them were and are fantastic. It is particularly nice that the base is center mounted on the unit, and does not necessitate purchasing yet another tv stand due to the "legs issue". The main issue I have with this TV is the software. It is not intuitive at all, and the need for 2 mobile apps to get full functionality is pretty ridiculous for a $900 tv. Additionally, getting ALEXA to work with this TV was an exercise in frustration, and not something that should occur at such a price point. Overall, I'm still happy with the unit, but LG needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture & Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: This is my second LG HD TV and I would buy another one if I needed too. The picture is great and is easily operated. Plenty of HDMI connections that easily connect with game consoles and Satellite tv. LG has many apps already available and connects to the web using wifi. Voice controlled remote that also works easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sirrocker

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this TV. Major band for your buck without going into Qled or Oled. This is a high quality product with an accurate video presentation. My issue is there is no independent brightness, color, contrast etc. You can switch between preset picture modes but can’t adjust manually. The ability to tweak these adjustments is important to me. I wouldn’t have bought the set knowing this,
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Heart

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: The back lighting sections are very large so a mostly black image with a small bright spot will show the different scree backlighting sections and detract from the show. It is too difficult to use Bluetooth with a phone but it has a nice web browser that makes up for that shortcoming. The remote takes time to get used to and has a strange shape but that is mostly just cosmetic. I am not wowed by the image and thought maybe it was my source material, however, all inputs seem to lack the high quality of the Sony I used to have that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Caron

customer_reviews.title: The magic control is great
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad with this TV. The quality is great, the voice commands work fine. It connects with Wi-Fi easily. The magic control is great for navigation, it has quick buttons for NetFlix and Prime. The Disney+, Apple+, YouTube, Prime, and Netflix apps are working just great for me. It doesn't have the best image and sound quality, but it deliver it, it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Estevão

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: This LG is not the highest end HD TV, but for the money it sure delivers a great experience. We were looking between this and the comparable Samsung, and we are very happy with our choice. Really good picture, easy operating system (there are some quirks at points but overall easy to use), not bad sound, but you do have to get past the privacy thing where you have to submit your information and connections for the total capabilities. I eventually caved as it is a much better experience with all of the functions. Would buy it again and would recommend it as the HD TV to buy at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Aloysius Carl

customer_reviews.title: Good 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TV for about a month now. Overall I'm very happy with my choice. Yes some people will knock it for poor black levels. I have no problem with the black levels it presents. On the plus side I have an excellent range of viewing angles. The Apps are easy to navigate. It has all the right connections for me. There are only 2 little dings I would give this TV. 1. Not too sure I care much for the remote. 2. The stand is pretty wobbly if bumped. I would be worried if I had little kids. Still thinking about wall mounting it.
customer_reviews.author: sam600sx

customer_reviews.title: A bought the TV for the Alexa integration ...
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I wanted to be able to do was to turn it on with Alexa. Well, that doesn’t work. Yes, you can use the remote to bark commands at Alexa. I can do that with the Alexa sitting next to the couch. What did I gain with the Alexa integration??? I gave it 4 stars since the TV is clear and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with my Vizio 47" 3D TV. I just decided I wanted to go with the UHD and heard good things about this TV. Got it on sale at Christmas and I have to say I have not been disappointed. I love the picture quality. The remote is android of course, and I'm an Apple person so I find it somewhat weird. I like the sound ... the guided set up is nice. Overall I'm very pleased and feel like I definitely got the best bang for my buck!
customer_reviews.author: Nola Keith

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this TV the picture is superb
customer_reviews.text: Love the picture quality, sound not bad at all, we did add a bose sound bar to add to the sound. It is in our living room, many compliments on the picture, it looks so real, we enjoy watching movies, love the 65" TV. We got it at the best price, delivery from Amazon was excellent, would definitely use their delivery truck, the men who delivered the TV were also excellent and very helpful and friendly. Good Job to All
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Fader

customer_reviews.title: Buyers be aware  if you buy a TV at Sam’s or Walmart they will not have Alexa, only Google!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this TV and have it hooked up seems to be outstanding, picture is awesome, remote very simple and similar to fire stick remote, sound is good. We have a complete theater room and it was very nice to have a TV in family room with just one single remote to do everything with a great sound system in it and only one power cord to plug-in, no cables at all. Buyers be aware if you buy a TV at Walmart or Sam’s they will not have Alexa, only google!
customer_reviews.author: B. Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Glad we picked this one
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Some channels/movies have a 3D look. Sound is very good, better than my old Sony 46". Setup was relatively easy but instructions (pictures only) were a laugh. Example: the screw packages had a circle with a line thru it and a screw picture as in "don't screw the screws". Video on line wasn't really helpful either. Anyway we really like the TV. Person that said it didn't mount vertically on stand was incorrect. It's perfectly vertical. (checked it with a level). Maybe theirs was defective. Amazon delivery was great. Didn't take a chance with regular shipping.
customer_reviews.author: j betz

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Wanted
customer_reviews.text: The TV fits perfectly where we planned, mounted on the wall in our family room. Installation was simple, but it is definitely a 2 or 3-man job due to weight and size. Picture quality is outstanding. We hooked it up to our surround sound system, so can't reliably rate the sound quality of the TV. I can recommend this TV to prospective purchasers.
customer_reviews.author: David Summers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV...LG... Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Intuitive setup. Fabulous profile and overall design. Gorgeous picture. I am so happy with this purchase. Still getting used to this great TV. So many features and such great current technology. Wanted to add it is Alexa compatible and the remote features AI technology for responding to voice commands. Interesting and is fun to explore and discover all the great features.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Finds

customer_reviews.title: Home Theatre FTW!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this TV so far. It’s big with a very thin frame, the picture is excellent. The sound quality is awesome and I do not have a sound bar. This is my 2nd LG TV and I am a fan. Love the cursor style remote, ability to use my apple products on screen, and setting everything up was a breeze. I looked into various models for over a month before getting this one and I believe I made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: LG has become my TV preference!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality and very configurable. This is my second LG TV (the other is an OLED) and LG has become my preference for TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful big tv! I went from a 42" inch to this 65" and what a difference. The pictures beautiful and once you get it hooked up and learn the remote control you have a wonderful tv. So happy I bought it❣️😊
customer_reviews.author: L Looslie

customer_reviews.title: Get the 65SM9000PUA  instead
customer_reviews.text: Both this set (the 8 series) and model 65SM9000PUA (the 9 series are both rated a best buy in Consumer Reports,. The 65SM9000PUA is $200.00 more. The extra $200 is WELL worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony NYCTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Best 65 inch for the coat. WOW . the picture quality is amazing. i am still learning all the features as its my 1st smart tv. however a little disappointed the magic remote would not operate fire tv recast box/guide...MAGIC remote? More like it does everything BUT that. I am exremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris young

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months I don’t think it has a great quality picture
customer_reviews.text: I edited my original review. After owning this since December I don’t feel it has that great of a picture. I am spoiled and have a Samsung that was top of the line in my bedroom. With new TVs out this doesn’t have a high quality picture like the OLEDs. But you get what you pay for and this is a 800 dollar tv
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Be extra careful unpacking this one and follow directions to the letter!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and picture and connections to Wi-Fi, etc. The back of the TV became disconnected from the screen. I am unsure whether it was the set-up here or happened in delivery. This a fragile item and needs at least two people to unpack it and set it up. TV works great- so I am keeping it and the openings will not be noticed.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Hohmeyer

customer_reviews.title: This is just wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great. Sound is fine and I get all the channals I ever wanted with an indoor antenna
customer_reviews.author: Margo D Schafer

customer_reviews.title: The best TV Ive ever had
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best tv ive ever had. Best quality pictures, no lags, no sudden shutdown, no sudden pauses like vizio or TCL. Thanks to the processor.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good as long as don't watch TV at night
customer_reviews.text: Great TV as long as you don't watch anything in the dark or the content your watching has dark scenes. Then it sucks and gives everything a bright gray tint. Stick to watching in well it rooms and only animated movies and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing TV. Setup was a breeze and the quality is apparent immediately. Super happy with my choice after a lot of research.
customer_reviews.author: D. Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: TV is great. I upgraded from a 2009 LG 49in TV to this. Such a big difference in size and quality. No issues at all, would recommend this to anyone looking for a new TV. Also the delivery service was excellent. Two polite guys showed up right on time and delivered the TV into my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful TV and delivery experience
customer_reviews.text: Great picture-wonderful size. Love everything about it. Amazon delivery folks were very courteous and professional. TV installation took about 20 minutes. Setting up tv took about another 10 minutes. I think for the money this purchase was fantastic. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Carol49

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great picture when you change a few settings. Turn off all power saving options then I like Vivid customized with some of the brightness settings turned down a bit. For the price this TV and picture are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures and value
customer_reviews.text: What a great tv. You can get a slightly better picture for almost $2000 more. OLED screens are the best but this is a great picture and value for the money. The interface is very complex and help isn’t very good. Still learning and adding features.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart TV for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, nice sound. The remote is a little limited, as is the Smart TV interface. It just takes more clicks to get where you want to go than it should, and some of the search features are not as comprehensive as it should be. Overall, great value for the price, and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LG TV. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV considering what I paid for. The small negative is the back panel is flimsy...friends thought it was damaged but picture works well so i just kept it.
customer_reviews.author: John Song

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great Tv. I wasn't happy with the picture when it first came and was going to return It. After doing a software update and sitting and adjusting the picture setting for hours, I have it dialed in and it has a fantastic picture. It also has very good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: helix33

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if the price point would bring me quality, but i was wrong...EZ to set up, great pic and sound quality...Love LG
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Gough

customer_reviews.title: Power button inadequate
customer_reviews.text: The power button doesn’t work. I have to engage the microphone in the remote and tell it verbally to turn off. The picture quality was supposed to be a step up from my 1080 P LG TV. Pixels is definitely more clear. The back lights and the blacks are very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe3rd

customer_reviews.title: Great TV.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture.The only thing I don't like is the magic remote. This is my second LG with it and I wish they included a regular remote instead of this piece of junk that bounces all ove the screen
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Remote = pain.  Picture =  winner all the way.
customer_reviews.text: As I said in the headline, although I'm no fan of the remote, the most important factor is the picture and that's awesome. I use this to watch Blu-rays and 4K discs, mostly; and for those uses I couldn't really want more.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Black

customer_reviews.title: LG remote not compatible with Comcast
customer_reviews.text: Remote is not compatible with Comcast. Do not buy if you are a Comcast customer. LG support is poor. They say the remote can only be paired with compatible devices. Comcast customers will not find out that it doesn't work until they set up the tv. No advance warning from LG. Wish I could return this product for a Samsung or Sony
customer_reviews.author: Bette Dezenski

customer_reviews.title: The remote is a little irritating.
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks like you are at the place. I like but sometimes it needs to be further away so you don't feel like you are at the place.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: This TV was a breeze to set up and the picture quality is fantastic, for a non OLED TV. The WEB OS interface is super simple to learn and navigate, and as someone who has a visual disability, the accessibility options on this TV are exceptional. It will even read out all the menus and settings to you with a voice if you cannot read the text on screen.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect. Lazy remote.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great apart from the remote has no FF or RW. So useing with recorded shows to skip commercials is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Havoc

customer_reviews.title: Clear and sharp
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing. The picture is great and clear. I love this tv. The sound is not bad. I didn’t install the sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Hoiyin K

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 TV, hard remote to get used to.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 star rating if the remote control wasn’t so difficult to understand. Otherwise I really love it
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a 10 year old LG that is now in my bedroom. Arrived on time, great condition. Awesome features, and an outstanding picture. I highly recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing! I absolutely love it. The delivery was awful tho. They threw it off the back of the truck and dragged it to my front door. Amazingly, the packing saved the tv and I have had no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Worst remote interface ever
customer_reviews.text: Really good TV . After a month I still find the remote interface impossible. The methodology that seems to work at one moment will not work the next . There is some terribly annoying red dot that does nothing. How could this happen? I would not buy this TV again based on the remote
customer_reviews.author: Gageosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Best picture quality of all
customer_reviews.text: This Tv is awesome. Great picture and features are many. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: This is a awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very high quality I am amazed at the quality for the price .The set up was super simple I would recommend this TV .The delivery was on time and no damage .Great decision to purchase this TV
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tv lies about Disney
customer_reviews.text: Love the tv but I was supposed to get Disney free for 6 months I filled out the required forms but never received my activation code total crap
customer_reviews.author: Howard S.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TV
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV! I upgraded from a 50inch 1080p LG from a few years ago and I'm blown away with the picture quality. The one draw back is the zone dimming vs local dimming on the higher models. Other than that its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AZsteve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: Had not bought a new tv in years and there are so many choices. I made the right one. Had it up and going in about 10 min. Super great picture and just love the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was exactly on time. TV setup was easy and picture is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV for the price. The only downside is that I like to watch images full screen, and there is no way to do this without losing part of the picture, and letterboxing does not seem to be one of the picture options.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with HBO GO
customer_reviews.text: The TV doesn’t take in charge HBO GO which is very frustrating. The rest is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: AS1983

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV! Great picture and I really like the built in apps (e.g., NETFLIX and Prime).
customer_reviews.author: Edmund E Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Top quality. Perfect sound & picture. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LSPayor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is outstanding. Internal speakers are OK. Added anLG sound bar to get better audio. The TV stand is flimsy. TV is very easy to set up and use. Would be nice if they would have added at least 1 RCA type audio output. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and the picture is perfect.Love this LG tv!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv
customer_reviews.text: works and looks great! Haven't had chance to watch any 4k content yet so no opinion on that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Really a great TV
customer_reviews.text: It's BIG! the picture is great and easy to learn....
customer_reviews.author: Hk Sponsler

customer_reviews.title: This product was the best thing I've purchased ever
customer_reviews.text: This was for the home and my wife was really surprised when it arrived at the house. Had it working in less than 10 minutes out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good choice for new TV
customer_reviews.text: like the LG component and the fact I can also use Firestick with it.
customer_reviews.author: William T Borchardt Jr

customer_reviews.title: 5 star in every way but..
customer_reviews.text: Product is overall amazing, the only critic I have is the because of it being edge-lit, the blacks are opaqued by white letters (closed captioning/subtitles) nothing extreme but it can become very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Ethernet
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with this tv, my only note is that I didn’t realize I advance that I needed an Ethernet cable, I thought the regular cable connection would suffice. But once I connected the Ethernet cable every was smooth sailing.
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne H Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: LG TV
customer_reviews.text: Amazing experience with Amazon as seller. The TV is as described and fantastic picture quality. Only buy from Amazon & not any third party seller as we received defective TVs until this.
customer_reviews.author: Prateek Shrivastava

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: Full array is really bad but besides that screen quality is wonderful and you notice the 120hz when you’re a gamer
customer_reviews.author: Julian Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: So far this TV was well worth the money we spent on it. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tribidy

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, but lacks access to common apps

customer_reviews.title: 65" Large TV with great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This 65" TV works great, easy to setup, picture is good and the speaker sound is excellent! I'm satisfied with my purchase and also got a discount with Amazon price cut deal! Amazon delivery service was great and the two delivery drivers were prompt with follow up phone call before delivery and were courteous. I would recommend, Check out my photos...
customer_reviews.author: Kev

product_meta.title: LG 65SM8600PUA Alexa Built-in Nano 8 Series 65" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED NanoCell TV (2019)
product_meta.description: Style:2019 Edition| Size:65-InchThe Nano Cell Display ensures a picture with better quality in the LG NanoCell TV Nano 8 Series, SM8600. Nano Accuracy keeps everything lifelike, and Nano Color delivers a spectrum of color. LG's powerful α7 Gen 2 Intelligent Processor enriches your content. Local dimming control helps light levels. Picture and sound are elevated with premium Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos. This LG AI TV is the world's most intelligent TV with LG ThinQ AI and the voice control of the Google Assistant* and Alexa are built-in. *Service limited to certain languages. Some features require 3rd party service subscriptions.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: W/ Stand 57.1"W x 35.8"H x 12.7"D | W/o Stand 57.1"W x 33.1"H x 2.5"D | Stand Width 32.7"
LG a7 GEN 2 INTELLIGENT PROCESSOR: Images, action and color are brought to new life to instantly enhance picture quality through LG's best 4K processor, empowered by AI at its core.
LG THINQ, ALEXA AND GOOGLE ASSISTANT: LG TVs are the first to integrate both the Google Assistant and Alexa with LG ThinQ AI technology.

DOLBY VISION AND DOLBY ATMOS: Transform your TV into an entertainment powerhouse Advanced image and sound technologies inspired by the cinema optimize picture and sound for a spectacular, more lifelike experience in every scene. The ultra-vivid picture and powerful, moving audio seem to flow all around you.
NANO COLOR: vibrant color and detailed crisp images, made possible by the tiniest of intricacies in design and engineering.

WISA SPEAKER COMPATIBILITY: works seamlessly to deliver high fidelity in wireless audio. It dramatically elevates the cinematic sound of everything you watch. Only supports 5.1 Channel and 2.0 Channel. Transmitter dongle required and sold separately.
AIRPLAY 2: with AirPlay 2 built in, you can effortlessly cast anthing from Apple iPhone or laptop to your LG AI TV
VESA Mounting (W x H)- 300 x 300/ TV Tuner - ATSC, Clear QAM, Operating System - webOS
